sentences.en: A late booking may involve you in extra cost.
sentences.cn: 预订晚了的话你可能要额外多花钱。

sentences.en: A retrofit may involve putting in new door jambs.
sentences.cn: 房子翻新可能需要安装新的门框。

sentences.en: Although superstitions involve beliefs and practices, they are usually transmitted as sayings.
sentences.cn: 虽然迷信涉及的是信仰和行为, 但它往往以谚语的形式出现.

sentences.en: Don't involve me in your quarrel.
sentences.cn: 不要把我卷进你们的争吵中.

sentences.en: Don't involve yourself in unnecessary dispute.
sentences.cn: 不要把自己卷入无谓的争论中.

sentences.en: Don't involve yourself with those people.
sentences.cn: 不要和那些人混在一起.

sentences.en: For the idea of a perfect being does not involve the attribute.
sentences.cn: 因为“完美无缺的存在”这一概念并未涉及其属性.

sentences.en: Gall - blader disease and cystic fibrosis also often involve me.
sentences.cn: 胆囊疾病和胰腺囊性纤维性变也常常纠缠我.

sentences.en: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.cn: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

sentences.en: I knew what the job would involve — I went into it with my eyes open.
sentences.cn: 我知道这工作涉及什么——我还是有意识地选定这项工作.

sentences.en: If there was a cover-up, it involved people at the very highest levels of government.
sentences.cn: 如果有掩盖真相的行为，它就牵扯到了处于政府最高层的那些人。

sentences.en: Most air rage incidents involve heavy drinking.
sentences.cn: 大多数的空中暴力事件与酗酒有关。

sentences.en: That is perhaps why sculpture has been described as the most difficult of all arts; certainly it is more difficult than arts which involve appreciation of flat forms, shape in only two dimensions.
sentences.cn: 人们把雕塑说成是一切艺术中最困难的,可能就是这个道理. 当然,它比起只涉及平面形态, 即二维形态的艺术品要困难些.

sentences.en: The £85m programme will involve an extensive rebranding of the airline.
sentences.cn: 这个8,500万英镑的项目将包括全面重塑该航空公司的形象。

sentences.en: The school's unexceptionable purpose is to involve parents more closely in the education of their children.
sentences.cn: 学校的目的无非是让家长更多地参与孩子的教育。

sentences.en: The treatment does not involve the use of any artificial drugs.
sentences.cn: 这种治疗不会使用任何人工合成药物。

sentences.en: There have been four accidents involving Forest Service planes.
sentences.cn: 已有四次事故涉及（美国）林务局的飞机。

sentences.en: These changes will involve everyone on the staff.
sentences.cn: 这些变化将影响每一位职员。

sentences.en: This would inevitably involve his departure from the post of Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这将不可避免地导致他辞去首相一职。

sentences.en: What will the job involve?
sentences.cn: 这份工作包括什么？

words.tran_cn: 牵连；包含；混乱；财政困难
涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

trans.tran_en: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it
